Sequence Information.Peptide Name: AnAFP (Anafp, A. niger antifungal protein, natural AMPs; UCSS1a; 3S=S, fungii)

Literature Information.Literature: Isolated from fungal culture supernatant. Sequence: 79.3% similar to AP1562. 9% Thr, 10% His and 10% Cys. GRAVY: -0.867, Mol formula: C273H428N82O90S6; Mol Wt: 4845; Mol Ex. Coeff.: 4845.Activity: It inhibited yeast strains C. albicans (MIC 8-15 uM) and S. cerevisiae (MIC 8 uM) as well as filamentous fungi A. flavus (MIC 8 uM), A. fumigatus (MIC 4-8 uM), F. oxysporum (MIC 8-15 uM), F. solani (MIC 8 uM), T. beigelii (MIC 8-15 uM); bacteria E-coli (MIC >50 uM), B-subtilis (MIC>50 uM). Sequence updated 7/2021; 2/2022
Literature Information.Author: Gun Lee D, Shin SY, Maeng CY, Jin ZZ, Kim KL, Hahm KS.1999
Literature Information.Title: Isolation and characterization of a novel antifungal peptide from Aspergillus niger
